    Johnny Artemas Project

    About Johnny Artemas

    Johnny Artemas project is a group project established by Department of Educational Technology of University of Ilorin as a 501(c)(3) non-profit. Like most websites, the goal of Johnny Artemas Project is to make lessons interesting, learning easy.

    Purpose of this learnig material

  • Learning Support: This Learning materials can significantly increase learner's achievement by supporting learning. For example, an educational video may provide with new insight and an appealing worksheet may provide the learner with new opportunities to practice a new skill gained in class.
  • Learning Structure: This learning material can also add important structure to lesson planning and the delivery of instruction
